mapper.insert: insert into t_store (store_id, store_name, sales_amount, store_grade, sending_price, delivery_cost, store_distance, store_activity_tip1, store_activity_tip2, store_image, brief_introduction, store_notice, store_tel, store_address, send_start_time, sent_end_time, store_qualification) values (#{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storeGrade,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sendingPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliveryCost,jdbcType=REAL}, #{storeDistance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storeActivityTip1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeActivityTip2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{briefIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeNotice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sentEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeQualification,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_store set store_name = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sales_amount = #{salesAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, store_grade = #{storeGrade,jdbcType=REAL}, sending_price = #{sendingPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delivery_cost = #{deliveryCost,jdbcType=REAL}, store_distance = #{storeDistance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, store_activity_tip1 = #{storeActivityTip1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_activity_tip2 = #{storeActivityTip2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_image = #{storeImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brief_introduction = #{briefIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_notice = #{storeNotice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_tel = #{storeTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_address = #{storeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_start_time = #{sendStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sent_end_time = #{sentEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_qualification = #{storeQualification,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select store_id, store_name, sales_amount, store_grade, sending_price, delivery_cost, store_distance, store_activity_tip1, store_activity_tip2, store_image, brief_introduction, store_notice, store_tel, store_address, send_start_time, sent_end_time, store_qualification from t_store where store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select store_id, store_name, sales_amount, store_grade, sending_price, delivery_cost, store_distance, store_activity_tip1, store_activity_tip2, store_image, brief_introduction, store_notice, store_tel, store_address, send_start_time, sent_end_time, store_qualification from t_store
